mapper.select: select count(distinct a.userid) x , b.character y from investor_demand a right join investor_demand_character b on b.investor_demand_id = a.id group by b.character order by count(distinct a.userid) desc limit #{froma},#{sizea}

select count(distinct a.userid) y , b.segmentation x from investor_demand a right join investor_demand_segmentation b on b.investor_demand_id = a.id group by b.segmentation order by count(distinct a.userid) desc limit #{froma},#{sizea}
